properties.name: Big Fiction
properties.description: Independent journal publishing long-form fiction and nonfiction twice a year.

properties.name: Book Lust with Nancy Pearl
properties.description: Monthly interview series hosted by Nancy Pearl about books, reading, and the process and art of writing with authors, poets, and other literary figures.

properties.name: Book Patrol
properties.description: Spans the internet to bring you book news, images, and related content from all corners of the globe.

properties.name: Cascadia Magazine
properties.description: Nonprofit digital magazine that covers the people, places, and culture of the Pacific Northwest.

properties.name: Crab Creek Review
properties.description: Founded in 1983 with the goal of introducing readers to the best poetry, fiction, and creative nonfiction from the Northwest and beyond.

properties.name: Double Xposure
properties.description: Podcast hosted by Marcie Sillman and Vivian Phillips exploring how culture and creativity shape our lives.

properties.name: Glossophonics
properties.description: Radio show celebrating the study or appreciation of all sound based forms of communication, including poetry, music, noise, screams, and other nonsense.

properties.name: Image
properties.description: Fosters writing grappling with the mystery of being human by curating, cultivating, and celebrating work that explores religious faith and spiritual questions.

properties.name: Moss
properties.description: Literary journal of writing from the Pacific Northwest, published annually.

properties.name: Northwest Book Lovers
properties.description: Blog by and about authors, librarians, and independent booksellers in Alaska, Idaho, Montana, Oregon, and Washington.

properties.name: The Offing
properties.description: Online literary magazine publishing creative writing in all genres and art in all media.

properties.name: Pacifica Literary Review
properties.description: Online magazine publishing poetry, fiction, and creative nonfiction three times a year.

properties.name: The Poet Salon
properties.description: Podcast hosted by Dujie Tahat, Gabrielle Bates, and Luther Hughes who interview poets over drinks prepared especially for them.

properties.name: The Poetry Department
properties.description: Online website for all-things-poetry in Cascadia, including a 12-month calendar of readings.

properties.name: Raven Chronicles
properties.description: Independent press and literary organization established in 1991 to showcase art and writing embodying the cultural diversity of writers and artists.

properties.name: Shelf Awareness
properties.description: Publishes two free newsletters, one for general readers and one for people in the book business.

properties.name: The Seventh Wave
properties.description: Arts and literary digital magazine and residency program that invites writers, artists, activists, and creators to take part in a conversation surrounding the most pressing social issues of our times.

properties.name: Sublunary Press
properties.address: 568 First Ave S, Ste 120 Seattle, WA 98104
properties.description: Independent publisher of contemporaneous literature. Home of the magazine Firmament and imprint Empyrean Series devoted to neglected historic works.

properties.name: Tahoma Literary Review
properties.description: Pacific Northwest literary journal publishing fiction, nonfiction, and poetry.
